title: New: French Films – When People Like You Filled The Heavens
body:
**French Films** earmarked themselves out as a one to watch with their debut EP **_Golden Sea_** back in 2010, and have been working hard on new material since then.

Despite a break of almost 10 months since their last release, it’s clear that they’ve not lost their uncanny knack for writing catchy, upbeat indie pop, as displayed by new single _When People Like You Filled The Heavens_. As with previous material, it’s classically 80’s inspired, drawing from **The Smiths** and **The Jam** to form a raucously enjoyable three minute pop gem. Check it out below.
